Package org.netbeans.core.multitabs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonFactory
    Factory that create buttons to be displayed next to document tabs.
    Controller  
    Settings
    Read-only access to multi-tab settings.
    TabbedComponentFactoryImpl
    TabbedComponentFactory that overrides the default implementation in core.windows module.
    TabbedImpl
    The default Tabbed implementation.
    TabContainer
    Visual component that has a TabDisplayer component and the actual document tab components arranged in StackLayout.
    TabDecorator
    Register implementations of this class in global Lookup to adjust tab rendering.
    TabDisplayer
    Paints the tabs.
    TabDisplayerFactory
    Factory to create TabDisplayer instances.
